page.title: 18A Policeman in Sutton on Sea
page.content: {Mr A.Cooney}has been a policeman in Sutton for 8 years.He studied to be a policeman at Panel Ash.The most common crime here is criminal damage.There are about 20 car crashes a years in Sutton but some are not reported.The worst break-in was 5 or 6 years ago.During the miners' strike {PC.Cooney's}life was very difficult because the other policemen went there and he had to do their jobs as well as his own.He has never been seriously injured but one Christmas Eve he was hit in the eys by a piece of wood thrown by some boys who had had too much to drink and were messing about. {Mr Cooney}thinks the worst thing he has to do is to deal with accidents involving children.Although{PC.Cooney does report people he does not like doing it.
